name: Snailway Accident
description:
Trigger warning for car accidents and suicide.

Having the ability to rewind time, you as a snail attempt to figure a way out of the situation you're in. A short  interactive game with a little bit of dark humor and references sprinkled in.

This game was the result of two weeks work and part of my progress on a 100 game dev challenge.  All progress streamed live on twitch. That being said, it's unlikely that I'll go back to revisit previous work to add more.

With that said,  hope you get a kick out of it.
